text: Charles Rennie Mackintosh (7 June 1868 â€“ 10 December 1928) was a Scottish designer who worked around the turn of the 19th/20th century. He was based in the city of Glasgow. His style is still much in demand and examples of his work are sought after and command high prices. Category:1868 births Category:1928 deaths Category:British designers Category:People from Glasgow
title: Charles Rennie Mackintosh
